msgs.content: Hola!
Imagination is the highest kite one can fly. Lauren Bacall
lfhjds
He that respects himself is safe from others; he wears a coat of mail that none can pierce. Henry Longfellow
gkl;jafgk
Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.Thomas Jefferson
jgfaskgjj
Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.  Leonardo da Vinci
gska;
The greatest part of our happiness depends on our dispositions, not our circumstances. Martha Washington
jagsjk
The most dangerous way to lose time is not to spend it having fun, but to spend it doing fake work. When you spend time having fun, you know you're being self-indulgent.Paul Graham
gasfj
When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us. Alexander Bell
gasfkj
Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing.  Napoleon Hill
gfslkjafgkj
The real measure of your wealth is how much youd be worth if you lost all your money.
fgkljf
Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.  Buddha
gda
Every man's life lies within the present; for the past is spent and done with, and the future is uncertain.Marcus Aurelius
jfgas
If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through.
jlfs
No garden is without its weeds. Thomas Fuller
knkkl
You've got a lot of choices.  If getting out of bed in the morning is a chore and you're not smiling on a regular basis, try another choice.D. Woodhull
knklklkkl
Adversity has the effect of eliciting talents, which in prosperous circumstances would have lain dormant. Horace
If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?Joe Namath
n
Im not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.Bruce Lee
m
Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.Joyce Brothers
nb
You're never a loser until you quit trying.Mike Ditka
jb
When your desires are strong enough you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.  Napoleon Hill
jhv
Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.  Carl Jung
jh

If you're feeling low, don't despair. The sun has a sinking spell every night, but it comes back up every morning. The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.Dolly Parton
All is flux; nothing stays still. Heraclitus
There never was a good knife made of bad steel. Benjamin Franklin
If you kick a stone in anger, you'll hurt your own foot.Korean Proverb
When you doubt your power, you give power to your doubt.Honore de Balzac
Every sixty seconds you spend angry, upset or mad, is a full minute of happiness youâ€™ll never get back.
It isn't where you come from, it's where you're going that counts.Ella Fitzgerald
With the realization of ones own potential and self-confidence in ones ability, one can build a better world.Dalai Lama
Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius. Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you. You may have a fresh start any moment you choose.Mary Pickford
No one who achieves success does so without the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude. Alfred North Whitehead
You can't let praise or criticism get to you. It's a weakness to get caught up in either one.John Wooden
Adversity causes some men to break, others to break records. William Ward
The true way to render ourselves happy is to love our work and find in it our pleasure. Francoise de Motteville
What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life. Leo Buscaglia
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.Anne Frank
I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can. Bernard Shaw
You have to believe in yourself.  Sun Tzu
Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
No is easier to do. Yes is easier to say.Jason Fried
Peace begins with a smile.  Mother Teresa
In order to win, you must expect to win.  Richard Bach
People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it.Chinese Proverb
The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.Augustinus Sanctus
I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.  Joseph Stalin
The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same. Carlos Castaneda
The past has no power to stop you from being present now. Only your grievance about the past can do that.Eckhart Tolle
Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.Agatha Christie
For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.Mary Kay Ash
Argue for your limitations, and sure enough theyre yours.  Richard Bach
Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work. Rita Mae Brown
He can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law.Pablo Picasso
Intuition is the very force or activity of the soul in its experience through whatever has been the experience of the soul itself. Henry Reed
Sadness flies away on the wings of time. Jean de la Fontaine
Thats the risk you take if you change: that people you've been involved with won't like the new you. But other people who do will come along.Lisa Alther
If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?  Confucius
They can do all because they think they can. Virgil
Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.Leo F. Buscaglia
People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.  Lewis Cass
The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to them their own. Benjamin Disraeli
We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us. Rabindranath Tagore
Kind words will unlock an iron door. Turkish Proverb
Most smiles are started by another smile.
We cannot do everything at once, but we can do something at once.  Calvin Coolidge
One faces the future with ones past.Pearl Buck
Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.  Tony Robbins
Every problem has a gift for you in its hands.Richard Bach
